## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass locally (run `make test`)
- [ ] Added/updated tests
- [ ] Updated documentation
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Code follows project style (run `make format`)
- [ ] All checks passes (run `make check`)
